description: In contrast to the mayhem at DePaul University, Breitbart Tech editor Milo Yiannopoulos was given a heros welcome at UCSB.
title: Milo Given Queen's Welcome at UC Santa Barbara
title_page: Milo Given Queen's Welcome at UC Santa Barbara
text:
In contrast to the mayhem at DePaul University, Breitbart Tech editor Milo Yiannopoulos was given a hero’s welcome at UC Santa Barbara.
Before giving another talk as part of his college tour, Milo was lifted onto the stage via a golden throne, accompanied by music of “America Fuck Yeah” from the film Team America.
Milo’s throne was carried to the stage by a group of American men wearing caps bearing Donald Trump’s now-famous slogan, “Make America Great Again.”
Milo, whose talk was entitled “Feminism is Cancer,” and was hosted by Young Americans for Liberty, opened the talk by saying that “I am finally entering in a manner I deserve.”
Unlike the chaos that took place at DePaul last Tuesday, dissidents were present at the event but queued peacefully and involved themselves as part of the Q&A when they were invited. A few students also congregated in a non-disruptive protest outside the venue ahead of the event.
